SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EDUCATION DATA ARCHITECTURE (EDA) DOCUMENTATION
Configure EDA

Configurations and customizations for EDA.

Configure EDA Basics
Assign record types to profiles, and page layouts to record types, so that users have access to the records that they need.
Enable EDA Apex Class Access
Verify access to EDA Apex classes for all profiles and permission sets that need them.
Education Cloud Settings
Access and manage EDA Settings, activate the latest EDA release, and find helpful resources.
Configure Account Model Settings
In EDA Settings, configure the settings that control your primary account model, including the Account record types used for Administrative and Household Accounts.
Customize Administrative and Household Account Names
Learn about, manage, and update Account names in EDA.
Configure Contacts' Email Addresses and Phone Numbers
Manage email and phone settings for Contacts in EDA.
Understand Addresses in EDA
Learn how addresses are tracked and stored in EDA.
Configure Address Settings
Manage and edit addresses for Contacts and Accounts in EDA.
State and Country Picklists for EDA
Understand how EDA uses State and Country Picklists.
Configure Affiliations Settings
In EDA Settings, click Affiliations and configure the Contact fields mapped to Primary Affiliations.
Configure Relationships Settings
Learn how to track important relationships between people and learn about optional configuration settings.
Configure Leads Settings
Customize the Lead object for use in your educational institution.
Configure Error Handling in EDA
Set up how EDA handles and tracks errors.
EDA and Translation
Learn how EDA is localized and how to manage translations.
